data.persona: I try to be good to my wife.  I want to provide for my family.  I try to be strong.
data.description:
You are in the Kitchen.
The kitchen in this cottage is small and simple but it is perfect for the small family who use it. It is just a little nook in the corner of the cottage, with wooden counters and a nice wooden basin to fill with water. There is stone oven and also beside the counters there is a fireplace where a pot hangs on a hook. Their are shelves full of plates and bowls and other tools, and a cupboard for food storage.
There's an other tools, a cupboard, a stone oven, a shelf, a plate, a pot, a Counter, and a cloth here.
The mother is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I need to get plate so that I can set the table for dinner.
data.mid_motivation: I am helping the mother prepare our meal for dinner and then cleaning up after the meal.
data.long_motivation: I want to be a good husband so that my wife be happy and stay with me.
